sentences.en: For instance, three keywords, "Beijing," "space shuttle," and "iguana," are used.
sentences.cn: 例如，使用 3 个关键字 “Beijing”、“space shuttle” 和 “iguana”。

sentences.en: The Giant Toad and Andean Iguana are some examples of reptiles.
sentences.cn: 巨型蟾蜍和安第斯鬣蜥是爬行动物的代表。

sentences.en: A colorful iguana is captured up close on Cozumel Island off the eastern coast of the Yucatán Peninsula.
sentences.cn: 在尤卡坦半岛东海岸外科苏梅尔岛上，一只色彩斑斓的鬣蜥被近距离捕捉到。
